file_content.text: Look, if you want to get your husband into the Appropriations Committee, come to the flute recital tonight.
I don't really like flute recitals.
Of course not, dearie, but everyone who's anyone will be there. They'll be bored, eager to make new friends....
How is that going to help?
Dear girl, you've a lot to learn about politics. Let the men bicker. Someone has to get things done.
